amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Defense Department from being used to engage in or facilitate human trafficking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used in contravention of section 1590 or 1591 of title 18, United States Code, or in contravention of the requirements of section 106(g) or (h) of the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 ( 22 U.S.C. 7104(g) or (h)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass (CA) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
